    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078619">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078619">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078619">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078619">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078619" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078620">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078620">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078620">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078620">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078620" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078621">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078621">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078621">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Encyclopedias (good for topic-generating and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078621">
          <div id="boxatt17078621" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130749">
              <a id="link_20130749" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5BSX" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130749,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716850}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Published by an academic press. Invited scholars. Great for bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24879143">
              <a id="link_24879143" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.eblib.com%2Fpatron%2FFullRecord.aspx%3Fp%3D775827&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24879143,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24879143}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Sacred Places
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Good for bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24879144">
              <a id="link_24879144" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24879144,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078622">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078622">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078622">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078622">
          <div id="boxatt17078622" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24879317">
              <a id="link_24879317" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24879317,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24879146">
              <a id="link_24879146" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24879146,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078623">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078623">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078623">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodical articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078623">
          <div id="boxatt17078623" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130738">
              <a id="link_20130738" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130738,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130791">
              <a id="link_20130791" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ant" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130791,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12485167}); ">
               Anthropology Plus
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Standard index for religious studies. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130741">
              <a id="link_20130741" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130741,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Standard index for religious studies. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24879161">
              <a id="link_24879161" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24879161,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24849416}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130804">
              <a id="link_20130804" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130804,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Standard index for word history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130739">
              <a id="link_20130739" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130739,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130787">
              <a id="link_20130787" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130787,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343609}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Recent archive of journals from a number of academic presses.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078624">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078624">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078624">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078624">
          <div id="boxatt17078624" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130742">
              <a id="link_20130742" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130742,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Pilgrimage: Rites of Way', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4642609" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078625">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078625">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078625">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources and compiling an annotated bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078625">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078625" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078626">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078626">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078626">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078626">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078626" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
